sentence: Writing on Twitter, Ocasio-Cortez accused McCarthy of covering for the racist behavior of Greene and Rep. Paul Gosar (R-AZ) for years.
author: Brad Reed
title: 'Protecting his KKK Caucus': Ocasio-Cortez shreds Kevin McCarthy for 'toothless' condemnation of Marjorie Greene

title: AOC tears into Kevin McCarthy for 'protecting his little KKK caucus'
